Class NoisySensor

source code

An sensor with additive white Gaussian noise.

Method Details

__init__(self, platform, noiseStdDev, **kwargs)
(Constructor)

source code 

Initialise sensor.

Parameters:
  • platform - Platform this sensor will be attached to.
  • positionOffset - Position offset vector of this sensor in the local co-ordinate frame of its host platform.
  • rotationOffset - Rotation offset quaternion of this sensor in the local co-ordinate frame of its host platform.
  • noiseStdDev - Standard deviation of measurement noise.

noiseVoltages(self, t)

source code 

Generate non-deterministic noise to be added to output voltages.

Parameters:
  • t - time(s) at which measurements were taken, len(t) = N.
Returns:
3xN np.ndarray of noise voltages.
